name: LoopBall (FlameShape)
description:
Description

LoopBall is a multiplayer competitive sports game, about moving a ball in a loop like pattern. Your objective is to rotate the ball around the stadium, in the direction indicated by your teams colour, while blocking counter-rotations . Play offensive, defensive, or in any other way you like, it’s up to you!

Multiplayer

You can play LoopBall against bots (the suck atm), or you can play against real players! To do that, you can either host a match on your local computer, or join one. To host a match just click the host button, and share your IP addres with someone. To join a match, enther the IP address on the text field and click the join button.
